components.description:
The letter U, which can be used as part of a regional indicator pair to create emoji flags for various countries.

Previously this emoji incorrectly depicted the letter V when displayed in isolation on Samsung devices. This was corrected in January 2020.
components.title: Regional Indicator Symbol Letter U

components.description: The letter N, which can be used as part of a regional indicator pair to create emoji flags for various countries.
components.title: Regional Indicator Symbol Letter N

description: The flag for United Nations. May show as the letters UN. This two letter regional indicator pair is an exceptional reservation as part of ISO 3166.
title: Flag: United Nations

bn:00034960n: Emblem usually consisting of a rectangular piece of cloth of distinctive design
A flag is a piece of fabric with a distinctive design that is used as a symbol, as a signaling device, or as decoration.
A piece of cloth, often decorated with an emblem, used as a visual signal or symbol.
Piece of fabric with a distinctive design

bn:00078931n: An organization of independent states formed in 1945 to promote international peace and security

The United Nations is an international organization whose stated aims are facilitating cooperation in international law, international security, economic development, social progress, human rights, and achievement of world peace. Nations
E.g. French Organisation des Nations unies and Arabic: ????? ????? ???????
The United Nations is an intergovernmental organization established on 24 October 1945 to promote international co-operation.

A voluntary association of around 180 state signatory to the UN charter (1945), whose primary aim is to maintain international peace and security, solve economic, social, and political problems through international co-operation, and promote respect for human rights.

note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
